description: JSON Schema for communication class in Elephant Lexicon

email_address.description: An email address is a unique identifier used to send and receive electronic messages over the internet. It typically consists of two parts: a username and a domain name, separated by the '@' symbol.

phone_number.description: A phone number is a unique sequence of digits assigned to a specific telephone line or mobile device that allows it to be reached by a caller. It is typically comprised of a country code, area code, and a specific number assigned to the device.

title: communication
